statements: UPDATE traffic_flow_data SET vehicle_speed = 60.5, traffic_volume = 100 WHERE road_section_id = 1 AND vehicle_type = 'Car';
UPDATE traffic_flow_data SET timestamp = '2022-03-15 13:30:00', vehicle_speed = 45.7, traffic_volume = 80 WHERE road_section_id = 2 AND vehicle_type = 'Truck';
UPDATE traffic_flow_data SET vehicle_type='Car', vehicle_speed=60.5 WHERE road_section_id=101 AND timestamp='2022-05-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE traffic_flow_data SET traffic_volume=500, vehicle_speed=55.2 WHERE road_section_id=201 AND vehicle_type='Truck';
UPDATE traffic_data SET speed = 60 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE road_infrastructure SET traffic_volume = 1000, road_name = 'Main Street' WHERE road_id = 2;
UPDATE traffic_data SET speed = 60, time = '2022-10-27 08:30:00' WHERE id = 1001
UPDATE road_infrastructure SET traffic_volume = 1500, road_type = 'Highway' WHERE road_id = 500
UPDATE TrafficData SET speed = 70 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE RoadSegments SET traffic_flow = 3, congestion_level = 'Medium' WHERE segment_id = 5;
UPDATE TrafficData SET speed = 70, average_speed = 65 WHERE id = 100
UPDATE RoadSegments SET traffic_flow = 200, congestion_level = 'High Traffic' WHERE segment_id = 50
UPDATE TrafficFlowData SET average_speed = 60 WHERE flow_id = 1;
UPDATE RoadInfrastructure SET road_length = 500 WHERE road_id = 3;
UPDATE TrafficFlowData SET traffic_volume = 500, average_speed = 60 WHERE road_id = 101;
UPDATE RoadConstruction SET start_date = '2022-07-15', contractor_name = 'ABC Construction' WHERE construction_id = 201;
UPDATE TrafficFlowData SET flow_rate = 100 WHERE flow_id = 1;
UPDATE RoadInfo SET road_type = 'Highway', road_name = 'Highway A' WHERE road_id = 1;

UPDATE RoadAccidents SET accident_type = 'Vehicle Collision', road_id = 201 WHERE accident_id = 301;
